ygData.subject: LOL
ygData.msgSnippet: Threetoed Treetoad... that s a clever name! Sounds good, hehe. Edward... I m glad you figured everything out. It takes some time getting use to the game and
ygData.messageBody:
Threetoed Treetoad... that's a clever name! Sounds good, hehe.

Edward... I'm glad you figured everything out. It takes some time getting
use to the game and getting to know all of the buttons and comands, but you
will catch on. If you ever need any help, just shout for it using either
/shout or /ooc and most of the time someone in the zone will be able to help
you out. When I first started, I remember I was a wreck. I thought I would
never learn everything there was to know, but I did, and you will too. Good
luck and have fun!
